**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 137 2.0 **Usage** held in 2 hands **Bulk** L --- These panpipes are made of what seems to be beat-up tin bound by frayed leather and look like they shouldn't function at all, but in skilled hands they emit a beautiful sound that beguiles the senses. While playing the pipes, you gain a +1 item bonus to [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) and [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) checks. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Effect** You expend a number of charges from this instrument to cast a spell from its list. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Pipes of Compulsion **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 137 2.0 **Price** 90 gp **Bulk** L ---
  • **Cantrip** [_daze_](/Spells.aspx?ID=61)
  • **1st** [_charm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [_command_](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [_fear_](/Spells.aspx?ID=110)
Pipes of Compulsion (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 137 2.0 **Price** 460 gp **Bulk** L ---
  • **2nd** [_laughing fit_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1583), [_stupefy_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1691)
  • **3rd** _charm_, [_hypnotize_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1564), [_mind reading_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1602), [_ring of truth_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1656)
Pipes of Compulsion (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 137 2.0 **Price** 1,900 gp **Bulk** L --- The item bonuses are +2.
  • **4th** [_confusion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=48), [_suggestion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=315)
  • **5th** _charm_, [_glimmer of charm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=919), _suggestion_, [_telepathy_](/Spells.aspx?ID=337)
name: Pipes of Compulsion
